column1: The ultimate set for any fan of Power Rangers, Voltron, Gurren Lagann, GaoGaiGar, Superhuman Samurai Syber-Squad, Transformers or whatever combining mech-based TV show you were watching as a child or watching right now. If you ever wanted a combiner mech where each part does stand on its own and can be piloted by one of your favourite ninja... this set is for you! Buy it at any cost, it is worth every penny.
